item.title: Beginning Programming Lesson 01
item.author: jlhags+blog@gmail.com (Joshua Hagofsky)
item.description: When I was about 12 years old, my aunt gave us an old computer. Without going into all the details, I broke it, and all that it would then let you do is write programs in BASIC. It came with a book explaining how to do various things with the language. So having nothing better to do, I worked through it and taught myself how to code, and eventually went to college to learn how to do it better.
